content.raw:
This seems like an issue with header files. If you delete the build/gazebo_msgs/ folder, and then `make gazebo_msgs` what do you see? It should generate \*.pb.cc and \*.pb.h files and then compile them. Here's a brief snippet of what I see:
~~~
...
Scanning dependencies of target gazebomsgs_out
[ 65%] Building CXX object gazebo/msgs/CMakeFiles/gazebomsgs_out.dir/generator/GazeboGenerator.cc.o
[ 65%] Building CXX object gazebo/msgs/CMakeFiles/gazebomsgs_out.dir/generator/gazebo_generator.cc.o
Linking CXX executable gazebomsgs_out
Running C++ protocol buffer compiler on axis.proto
Running C++ protocol buffer compiler on boxgeom.proto
Running C++ protocol buffer compiler on camerasensor.proto
Running C++ protocol buffer compiler on collision.proto
...
Running C++ protocol buffer compiler on world_reset.proto
Running C++ protocol buffer compiler on world_stats.proto
Running C++ protocol buffer compiler on world_modify.proto
[ 65%] Built target gazebomsgs_out
Scanning dependencies of target gazebo_msgs
[ 65%] Building CXX object gazebo/msgs/CMakeFiles/gazebo_msgs.dir/axis.pb.cc.o
[ 68%] Building CXX object gazebo/msgs/CMakeFiles/gazebo_msgs.dir/boxgeom.pb.cc.o
[ 68%] Building CXX object gazebo/msgs/CMakeFiles/gazebo_msgs.dir/camerasensor.pb.cc.o
[ 68%] Building CXX object gazebo/msgs/CMakeFiles/gazebo_msgs.dir/collision.pb.cc.o
...
[ 96%] Building CXX object gazebo/msgs/CMakeFiles/gazebo_msgs.dir/world_stats.pb.cc.o
[ 96%] Building CXX object gazebo/msgs/CMakeFiles/gazebo_msgs.dir/world_modify.pb.cc.o
[100%] Building CXX object gazebo/msgs/CMakeFiles/gazebo_msgs.dir/msgs.cc.o
[100%] Building CXX object gazebo/msgs/CMakeFiles/gazebo_msgs.dir/MsgFactory.cc.o
Linking CXX shared library libgazebo_msgs.so
[100%] Built target gazebo_msgs
~~~
content.html:
This seems like an issue with header files. If you delete the build/gazebo_msgs/ folder, and then make gazebo_msgs what do you see? It should generate *.pb.cc and *.pb.h files and then compile them. Here's a brief snippet of what I see:

...
